name: Creative State
overview:
Creative State is a graphic and digital design team with a passion for developing brand identities, printed material and websites.

From logos and brochures to websites and online videos, they aim to help their clients build brand recognition, promote their products and services, and develop fresh, imaginative ideas that reach out to their customers.

Small and adaptable, they provide a personal service for every client and take a collaborative approach, which allows them the flexibility to create the right team for every project.

They don’t believe one size fits all, but offer a bespoke service, individually tailored to each client. This process involves learning about their business, planning a strategy and developing design concepts that support their objectives.

Proactive and forward thinking, they build long-term strategies to help grow businesses and create impact in all areas of design, from identity to print to digital.
